title: Camera FV-5 v2.38 [CTRG].apk
description:
Camera FV-5 is a professional camera application for mobile devices, that puts DSLR-like manual controls in your fingertips. Tailored to enthusiast and professional photographers, with this camera application you can capture the best raw photographs so that you can post-process them later and get stunning results. The only limit is your imagination and creativity!


Major features:

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ All photographic parameters are adjustable and always at hand: exposure compensation, ISO, light metering mode, focus mode, white balance and program mode.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ DSLR-like viewfinder display: see exposure time, aperture and stops display with EV and bracketing settings, in real-time!
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Full fledged exposure bracketing: from 3 to 7 frames, unlimited stops spacing, plus custom EV shifting.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Built-in intervalometer: make stunning timelapses (even bracketed/HDR timelapses) and time-controlled picture series.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Program and Speed-priority modes.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Long exposure support: take beautiful night photos and light trails with long exposure times up to 30 seconds**.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ JPEG, true 16-bit RAW in DNG format*, and lossless PNG photo capturing formats, perfect for post-processing.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Manual shutter speed: from 1/80000 to 2", or the range available on your device*.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ All camera functions assignable to volume keys. You can adjust EV, ISO, color temperature and more using volume keys. Devices with hardware camera shutter key are also supported.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ EXIF and XMP sidecar metadata support.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Autofocus, macro, touch-to-focus, true manual focus* and infinity focus modes. Autofocus lock feature (AF-L).
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Autoexposure (AE-L) and auto white balance (AWB-L) locks in Android 4.0+.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ In background photo and RAW developing and processing allows a smooth, uninterrupted camera operation.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Digital zoom using multitouch pinch gesture. Also shows 35mm equivalent focal length!
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ The most advanced electronic viewfinder: live RGB histogram, 10 composition grid overlays and 9 crop guides available.
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Powerful organization options: different storage locations and fully customizable file names (even with variables).
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ The user interface is available in more than 30 languages.

What's New
- New: RAW capture feature on the OnePlus One with a brand-new RAW engine that works also on Android 4.4. Now you can enable RAW capture in Settings/Photo encoding settings. RAW files are saved in the standard DNG format. When enabling RAW capture, the camera will produce a JPEG and a DNG file simultaneously.
- Improved: LG Nexus 5 and Motorola Nexus 6 RAW capture performance.
- Smaller bug fixes across the app.

Requires Android: 2.2 and up
